long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HoverNotes - Never rewatch a coding tutorial again üöÄ

Code, screenshots, and clear AI explanations. That's it.

Turn any coding tutorial into instant documentation:
- Copy-ready code snippets
- Implementation screenshots
- Clear explanations

üéØ Core Features:
- Extract code with proper syntax highlighting

- Get clear explanations in your preferred language

üíª Works where developers learn:
- YouTube tutorials
- Udemy courses
- LinkedIn Learning
- Tech conference talks
- And any video platform in your browser

üåç Watch in any language, get notes in yours:
- Supports 15+ languages including:
  English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Russian, and more

‚ö°Ô∏è Built for developers:
- Code syntax highlighting
- Markdown support
- Side-by-side video and notes

üîÑ Coming soon:
- PDF export
- AI powered search

‚ú® How it works:
1. Install extension and toggle video mode
2. Watch your tutorial

4. Get code and clear explanations
5. Reference anytime, no rewatching

üí¨ What developers say:
